page.title: 09SARAH MELLORS OF DEFYNNOG
page.content: I got up at 7.30, dressed, cleaned my teeth and washed my face, then I went down stairs and my dad made me a cup of tea. When my mum came down she brushed my hair then I got my bag and went to school. After assembly I went into class and did maths and library, then the bell went and I went outside. I played hopscotch then 'it' (touch). The whistle went so back in for more lessons before dinner. After dinner of meat pie, peas and potatoes with yogurt for sweet I played for a while before more lessons and swimming. After swimming I went to gran's and we had dinner then she gave me a packet of rolo and a drink of squash. In the evening I read the BFG and did a jigsaw. Then it was time to go home have a wash and read a bit more before going to bed.(27/6/85)
